price: "Então, o Dito de nosso Senhor cumpriu-se, contra nós. Por certo, haveremos de experimentar o castigo."
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
